targets.rawSql:
SELECT
                                toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                (countIf(response_status_code IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as value
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY time
                            ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                (countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') * 100.0 / count()) as value
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY time
                            ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                (countIf(response_status_code >= '500') * 100.0 / count()) as value
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY time
                            ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) as value
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY time
                            ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                    countIf(response_status_code >= '200' AND response_status_code < '300') / $__interval_s as status_2xx,
                                    countIf(response_status_code >= '300' AND response_status_code < '400') / $__interval_s as status_3xx,
                                    countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') / $__interval_s as status_4xx,
                                    countIf(response_status_code >= '500') / $__interval_s as status_5xx
                                FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                                WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                                GROUP BY time
                                ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                    (countIf(response_status_code IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as success_rate,
                                    (countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') * 100.0 / count()) as error_4xx_rate,
                                    (countIf(response_status_code >= '500') * 100.0 / count()) as error_5xx_rate
                                FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                                WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                                GROUP BY time
                                ORDER BY time

SELECT
                                response_status_code as status_code,
                                count() as request_count,
                                (count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit) AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment) AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code))) as percentage,
                                avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time,
                                CASE
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '200' AND response_status_code < '300' THEN 'Success'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '300' AND response_status_code < '400' THEN 'Redirect'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500' THEN 'Client Error'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '500' THEN 'Server Error'
                                    ELSE 'Unknown'
                                END as status_type
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY response_status_code
                            ORDER BY request_count DESC
                            LIMIT 20

SELECT
                                CASE
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '200' AND response_status_code < '300' THEN '2XX Success'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '300' AND response_status_code < '400' THEN '3XX Redirect'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500' THEN '4XX Client Error'
                                    WHEN response_status_code >= '500' THEN '5XX Server Error'
                                    ELSE 'Other'
                                END as status_category,
                                count() as request_count
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY status_category
                            ORDER BY request_count DESC

SELECT
                                platform,
                                count() as total_requests,
                                countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) as error_count,
                                (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as error_rate,
                                avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time,
                                uniq(client_ip) as unique_ips
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) AND length(platform) > 0
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY platform
                            ORDER BY error_rate DESC

SELECT
                                request_uri_normalized as uri,
                                response_status_code as status_code,
                                count() as error_count,
                                avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time,
                                groupUniqArray(5)(client_ip) as top_client_ips,
                                any(platform) as platform,
                                CASE
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '404' THEN 'Not Found'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '403' THEN 'Forbidden'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '401' THEN 'Unauthorized'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '400' THEN 'Bad Request'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '500' THEN 'Internal Server Error'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '502' THEN 'Bad Gateway'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '503' THEN 'Service Unavailable'
                                    WHEN response_status_code = '504' THEN 'Gateway Timeout'
                                    ELSE 'Other Error'
                                END as error_description
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY request_uri_normalized, response_status_code
                            HAVING count() > 5
                            ORDER BY error_count DESC
                            LIMIT 20

SELECT
                                client_ip as ip_address,
                                count() as total_requests,
                                countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) as error_count,
                                (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as error_rate,
                                uniq(request_uri_normalized) as unique_endpoints,
                                arraySlice(groupArray(response_status_code), 1, 5) as status_samples,
                                (countIf(response_status_code >= '400') * 1 +
                                 if(count() > 1000, 2, 0) +
                                 if((countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) > 20, 3, 0) +
                                 if(countIf(response_status_code >= '500') > 0, 2, 0)) as risk_score,
                                CASE
                                    WHEN countIf(response_status_code >= '500') > 10 OR (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) > 50 THEN 'High Risk'
                                    WHEN countIf(response_status_code >= '400') > 20 OR count() > 1000 THEN 'Medium Risk'
                                    ELSE 'Low Risk'
                                END as risk_level
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY client_ip
                            HAVING countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) > 10
                            ORDER BY risk_score DESC
                            LIMIT 15

SELECT
                                api_category,
                                count() as total_requests,
                                countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) as error_count,
                                (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as error_rate,
                                countIf(response_status_code >= '500') as server_errors,
                                countIf(response_status_code >= '400' AND response_status_code < '500') as client_errors,
                                uniq(client_ip) as unique_ips,
                                CASE
                                    WHEN (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) > 10 AND count() > 1000 THEN 'Critical'
                                    WHEN (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) > 5 OR countIf(response_status_code >= '500') > 50 THEN 'Warning'
                                    ELSE 'Normal'
                                END as health_status
                            FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                            WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) AND length(api_category) > 0
                                AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                            GROUP BY api_category
                            ORDER BY error_rate DESC

SELECT
                                    toStartOfInterval(log_time, toIntervalSecond($__interval_s)) as time,
                                    api_category,
                                    (countIf(response_status_code NOT IN ('200', '201', '202', '204', '301', '302', '304')) * 100.0 / count()) as error_rate
                                FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3
                                WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time) AND length(api_category) > 0
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
                                    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
                                GROUP BY time, api_category
                                HAVING count() > 10
                                ORDER BY time, api_category
